questions.subject: ComfyUI-Yolov8
questions.question: How can I install the ComfyUI-Yolov8 plugin?
questions.answer: To install ComfyUI-Yolov8, first navigate to the comfyui's `custom_nodes` directory. Then, clone the repository from `https://github.com/zcfrank1st/Comfyui-Yolov8.git`.

questions.subject: ComfyUI-Yolov8
questions.question: Where should I place the detect or seg models for the ComfyUI-Yolov8 plugin?
questions.answer: Detect or seg models for the ComfyUI-Yolov8 plugin should be placed in the comfyui's `models/yolov8` directory.

questions.subject: ComfyUI-Yolov8
questions.question: Can you provide an example of how to use the ComfyUI-Yolov8 plugin?
questions.answer: Yes, an example workflow diagram is provided in the README, which can be found at the repository's root (./workflow.png).
